subject: Re: junit 4.0 download -- javadoc ...
msgSnippet: ... My gut tells me that a lot of people will be installing JUnit 4 to kick the tires, while still needing to write JUnit 3-compatible tests. --
messageBody:
Kent Beck wrote:
> Thank you for your question. We included the junit.* classes in JUnit 4 for
> compatibility only, so we don't include them in the javadoc. I assumed that
> people would be using JUnit 4 to use the new architecture, and that people
> maintaining older tests would already know about the old architecture. Is
> this causing you problems?

My gut tells me that a lot of people will be installing JUnit 4 to "kick
the tires," while still needing to write JUnit 3-compatible tests.

--
========================================================================
Ian Pilcher i.pilcher@...
========================================================================
